headline.main: Italy's Top Court Orders Retrial of Ex-Finmeccanica Executives in India Bribery Case
headline.print_headline: Italy's Top Court Orders Retrial of Ex-Finmeccanica Executives in India Bribery Case

docs.snippet: Italy's highest court on Friday ordered a re-trial of former top executives at defense group Leonardo Finmeccanica over allegations of bribery in a 2010 contract to provide a dozen helicopters to the Indian government....
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy's highest court on Friday ordered a re-trial of former top executives at defense group Leonardo Finmeccanica over allegations of bribery in a 2010 contract to provide a dozen helicopters to the Indian government.

headline.main: Veneto Banca Says ECB Demands Higher Liquidity Ratio, Bad Loan Sale
headline.print_headline: Veneto Banca Says ECB Demands Higher Liquidity Ratio, Bad Loan Sale

docs.snippet: Italy's Veneto Banca said on Friday the European Central Bank had lifted the minimum requirement for a key liquidity indicator at the regional bank and asked it to cut its problem loans....
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy's Veneto Banca said on Friday the European Central Bank had lifted the minimum requirement for a key liquidity indicator at the regional bank and asked it to cut its problem loans.

headline.main: UN Chief Speaks to Reports He'll Run for South Korea Leader
headline.print_headline: UN Chief Speaks to Reports He'll Run for South Korea Leader

docs.snippet: Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon addressed mounting speculation that he will run for president of South Korea on Friday, saying he will decide how to best help his country when he returns home in early January after 10 years as U.N. chief....
